Package it.azraelsec.Server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RegistrationStub
    The RegistrationStub class is a RMI Stub that allows the remote RMI client to interact with the register method and to insert this way a new User object into the UsersDB instance.
    Server
    The Server class represents the process that serves the Client connection and spawn new TCPConnectionDispatcher threads to handler them.
    TCPRequestHandler
    The TCPRequestHandler class extends Runnable and represents a new Client connection execution and Commands dispatching and interpreting.
    User
    The User class represents a user into the TURING system and has got all the methods to retrieve all its notifications and to verify its credentials.
